alert.note: Alert for Muscatine (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 07 at 5:58PM CDT until May 07 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROCK ISLAND AND CENTRAL MUSCATINE COUNTIES... At 557 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Saulsbury Bridge Campground, or 9 miles northwest of Muscatine, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Muscatine, Sweetland Center, Fairport Recreation Area, New Era, Wildcat Den State Park, Pleasant Prairie, Illinois City, Fairport, Montpelier, Shady Creek Campground, Loud Thunder Forest Preserve, Midway Beach and Clark`s Ferry Recreation Area. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
